mapper.insert: SELECT TTY_IC_CONTACTS_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO tty_ic_contacts(ID,USER_NAME,MAIL,CONTACTS_TYPE,SIMPLE_NAME,PHONE,SEX,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_USER_ORG,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,EXT_DATE1,EXT_DATE2,EXT_NUM1,EXT_NUM2,EXT_NUM3,EXT_STR1,EXT_STR2,EXT_STR3,EXT_STR4,EXT_STR5) VALUES (#{id},#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{contactsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{simpleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extNum1,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extStr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_ic_contacts
USER_NAME = #{userName},
MAIL = #{mail},
CONTACTS_TYPE = #{contactsType},
SIMPLE_NAME = #{simpleName},
PHONE = #{phone},
SEX = #{sex},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
mapper.select: SELECT s.mobile phone FROM ( SELECT m.mo mobile FROM ( (SELECT u.MOBILE mo FROM toa_sys_user u where u.DELETE_FLAG = 0) UNION (SELECT c.phone mo FROM tty_ic_contacts c where c.DELETE_FLAG = 0)) m)s WHERE s.mobile = #{phone}
